Params: {1: 'In what seems to be an endless cycle of dark reincarnation,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 7: '-1'}
{1: "Veronica's consciousness appears to be drawn into a shadowy void.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 7: '-1'}
{1: "She feels as though she's walking through an endless dark corridor, where each door she pushes open,", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 7: '-1'}
{1: 'only reveals another identical hallway stretching before her.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 7: '-1'}
{3: 'A voice she recognizes calls out from beyond the door ahead.'}
{3: 'She steps forward and pushes the door open.'}
{3: "Before her is nothing but harsh white light flooding a chaotic laboratory. It takes Veronica's visual modules several seconds to adjust to the intense brightness."}
{3: 'Once her visual modules normalize, she spots a shocking splash of crimson amid the stark whiteness.'}

{1: '1', 3: "Among the scattered glass shards and twisted metal lies Serra, her body completely drenched in blood. With what little strength she has left, Serra holds open the laboratory's security door."}
{3: 'The shattered access panel nearby is smeared with thick, viscous blood. No one could fathom what incredible willpower drove her to forcibly break through the sealed security system.'}
{2: 'Laboratory System', 3: 'Warning. Abnormal status detected in sector. Test subject no longer under control.'}
{2: 'Laboratory System', 3: 'Support units, advance to Sector D on the top floor and assemble.'}
{3: 'The flat, emotionless electronic voice echoes throughout the entire laboratory complex.'}
{3: 'In an instant, the cold white light turns to pulsing red alarms, bathing everything in a harsh crimson.'}
{3: "Countless automated support units instantly respond to the terminal system's command and quickly block the only escape route from the laboratory."}
{3: 'With it, a storm of bullets and muzzle flashes instantly floods the confined space.'}
{3: "Crimson blooms erupt across Serra's body as the pool of blood under her grows larger by the second."}
{3: 'Despite everything, she channels her remaining strength and every ounce of her being to maintain her position to keep the laboratory door access system open.'}
{3: 'She turns to look at Veronica. Despite her grievous wounds, Serra shows no signs of pain as she forces a smile.'}
{3: 'Blood stains her lips, yet her smile remains as pure and innocent as ever.'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Once you're out... turn left... then... through the hallway in Sector F...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "I've... already... taken care of... the security doors... there...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Hey, Veronica... do I... look... ridiculous... like this...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Another round from the support units tears through Serra's chest."}
{3: "The bullet pierces Serra's fragile body at top speed and lets out a shriek before it finally hits the wall with devastating force and comes to a stop."}
{3: 'Robbed of strength and will by the ammunition, Serra, having endured the assault for far too long, falls to the floor.'}
{3: "Before Serra's body hits the floor, however, her fall stops."}
{3: 'She feels weightless, like a fledgling bird spreading its wings for the first time as it soars into the boundless freedom of the sky.'}
{3: 'The sky above feels vast and empty. As if being enveloped by gentle clouds, she feels every last bit of pain and fear leaving her body.'}
{3: "The only thing that's left is a bone-deep coldness when all her other sensations have faded away."}
{3: 'Why is this endless sky so utterly cold? Practically unable to process anything in her mind anymore, Serra is unable to answer this question.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Serra's lifeless body lies limply in Veronica's arms."}
{3: 'Her once vibrant emerald eyes, having lost their focus, stare not at Veronica, but into the empty nothingness.'}
{3: 'Her voice fades to barely a whisper, her lips producing meaningless, fragmented words.'}
{3: "Veronica leans down as she holds Serra tightly against her chest, as though trying to hold on to a life that's quickly slipping away."}
{3: 'For the first time, Veronica truly comprehends how fragile a human body is—like a piece of paper that could tear apart at any moment.'}
{3: 'In her arms, Serra no longer feels as warm as Veronica remembers her from when she carried out maintenance on her.'}
{3: "For the first time, she feels the beating of the human heart. It beats at a rhythm entirely different from the energy core powering a mechanoid's shell."}
{3: 'But now, that heartbeat is gradually coming to a stop.'}
{3: 'With her eyes closed peacefully, Serra gives no response, looking as though fatigue has gotten the better of her.'}
{3: "The mechanoid rises slowly to her feet, cradling her friend's body securely in one arm."}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'I will... get you out of here!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Facing a barrage of ammunition from the support units, Veronica appears completely fearless.'}
{3: "She cradles Serra's body with one arm while aiming her lance forward with the other."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "I'm going to crush every last one of you standing in my way!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The support units open fire with crushing intensity, attempting to halt Veronica's advance—yet the storm of bullets doesn't seem to set her back even one single step."}
{3: 'Determined to fight her way through, she wields her lance, ignoring the mounting damage to her frame as she thrusts and cuts with relentless fury.'}
{3: 'But the fiery downpour of countless bullets intensifies, threatening to blanket her field of vision.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "I'm not going to let you people... Argh!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Excruciating pain surges through every corner of her consciousness module once more, as a curtain of cold darkness that she seems to recognize slowly draws across her vision.'}
